body:
- New way to add columns
- Added ability to add spacing between columns
Added support for custom layoutmanager in boardview columns

- Updated gradle and sdk versions
- Migrated support lib to androidx

name: Added swapAdapter method to DragListView
Fixed crash when clearing board and no headers were added for columns
Added support to be able to add a boardview column at a specific index
body:
- addColumnList is now renamed to addColumn
- added insertColum api

name: Added feature to be able to drag and reorder columns on the a board
Fixed so scrollposition is restored when rotating
Added feature to be able to listen to when the focused column changes
Updated target sdk and gradle version
Exposed findChildView() method
Added abstract method to adapter to make sure unique ids are provided for each item
Fixed crash when dragging between columns in BoardView
Fixed crash when restoring BoardView
Added support to be able to control drag and drop positions in BoardView
Fixed autoscroll issue
Added feature to snap column to left, center or right
Added new api to enable snap to column in landscape
Stability and api update
body:
Added api to track dragging of a BoardView item
Fixed so you can use scrollbars in BoardView lists
Fixed a problem where big items in lists behave weird when moved over by smalled items

name: Fixed render tool problem
Fixed crash when no adapter is set
Added public method to list swipe helper
Added swipe functionality to list items
Added setColumnWidth api on BoardView
Fixed a problem with match_parent on draglistview
Added feature to be able to disable reorder or items when dragging.
Added the possibility to restrict drag and drop positions
Added can not drag below last item feature
Added new method to DragListListener
Fixed problem with setCanNotDragAboveTopItem api
Added support for api level 11
Merged pull request and updated some libs
Updated to recyclerview 23.1.0 and more
body:
- Changed to notifyItemMoved because of performance problems in 23.1.0
- Added support for horizontal gridlayout in DragListView

name: Added new api on DragListView
body:
public boolean isDragging()
public void setScrollingEnabled(boolean scrollingEnabled)

name: Added new api on DragListView
Updated recyclerview version
Fixed so any layout manager can be set on the recyclerview
Fixed problem with addItem and scrollbars
body:
- You can now enabled and disable scrollbars on the recyclerview
- Fixed a bug were you could not call addItem on the last position in the list
- Added a new api to boardView: moveItem(long itemId, int toColumn, int toRow, boolean scrollToItem)

name: Fixed issue with parent stealing touch events after a drag has started
Added functionality to enable/disable drag and drop
body: - Added new api to enable/disable drag. setDragEnabled(boolean enabled)

name: Disabled multitouch and exposed a new api
body:
- scrollToColumn is now available
- disabled multitouch in list and board as that only causes issues

name: Changed how to use and extend the DragItemAdapter
body:
You should no longer override removeItem, addItem, changeItemPosition
and getPositionForItemId(). This is now done by the super class.
Instead you need to set the item list by calling setItemList() with
a List<T> type.

If you want you can still override the methods if needed.

name: Fixed problem when scrolling in list
body: - Vertical scrolling in the lists of the boardview now works better

name: Fixed bugs and added some convenience methods
body:
- Added some methods to remove, add and move items
- Fixed bug when dragging an item to the end of a column
- Fixed crash

name: Fixed bugs and updated appcompat version
body:
- Fixed onDragEnded returned from fromColumn and fromRow
- Fixed snap dragging card to column issue

name: Added snap when dragging card
body:
- Added functionality to snap to column when dragging a card
- Bumped version to the same a maven version
- Small bug fixes

name: First release of the drag and drop list and boardview
